trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Tonawanda
There were no other sightings in Tonawanda on or around February 6th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a very clear night with a full moon. I was standing in my driveway with a friend when we noticed what at first appeared to be a star, but the object began streaking across the sky headed in northern and slightly eastern direction. My friend thought perhaps it was a satellite. But as the object moved directly overhead, it appeared to grow in size (perhaps descending?) and the light became much more intense and brighter. The object then continued moving northeast and faded in intensity, but moved in a non-linear path, curving from a northeast path to a northwest path, until it faded from sight.
Summary: Streaking light headed North / North East
